Review_Text: SpoilerThe Andes Tragedy: 50 Years Later is a very compelling documentary about the tragedy and resilience and survival of the Uruguayan Air Force Flight 571 which crashed into the Andes in 1973. I first learned about the tragedy when I watched the movie Survive! In the 1970s, and then Alive.In this documentary we meet one of the survivors, and it's quite compelling as he returns to the site.
